item.title: How do i make a modzone
item.dc:creator: @eviltwin1 eviltwin1
item.description:
@eviltwin1 wrote:

well what u do is you could find a spot thats well hidden right…then u can aa a command to tell all your admins or mods for exampleelse if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modzone") && (playerRights >= 1)) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; sendMessage("Welcome to The mod zone"); } }
in the spot were it says teleportToX = ****; replace the **** with teh x coord and do the same for the teleportToY = ****;…also if u want to make it just admin or co change playerRights >= 1 to like playerRights >= 2 or 3

Read full topic
